033fad40-f0b0-444b-86eb-018681ccc0b6.description: The Game Changer is an immersive six-week coaching experience designed to help professionals get what they want out of life—either in their careers or personal lives. Graduates possess science-backed knowledge and tools to deepen their curiosity, awaken their creativity, and sustain energy and focus.
033fad40-f0b0-444b-86eb-018681ccc0b6.name: The Game Changer

alignments.name: World-Class Coaches
alignments.description: We surround participants with industry-leading experts in fitness, neuroscience, and executive development. Exos coaches empathetically guide members from where they are to where they want to be.

alignments.name: Team Accountability
alignments.description: A team experience—carefully curated by Exos—brings a unique mix of diverse perspectives and ongoing support.

alignments.name: Phygital Experiences
alignments.description: Members leverage virtual 1:1 and small group discussions, as well as mobile-first content. They're pushed out of their comfort zones through transformational, real-world challenges.

alignments.name: Mind-Body Training
alignments.description: The Exos methodology helps make members aware of what’s going on in their brains and bodies.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the immersive program designed to help members increase the value they create—at work, and in life—by boosting their Drive, Courage, Curiosity, Creativity, and Grit.
Complete 18 hours of experiential learning.
Design a personalized Gameplan for future momentum.

9a6c3f93-9319-487a-b288-3c5dfcb466b0.description: The Team Builder: Sustainability is a one-day workplace workshop that focuses on the concepts of psych safety and strategic recovery, ultimately enabling teams to cultivate energy for the whole human (read: mental, physical, and emotional) that's needed not only for long term well being, but for fueling innovation.
9a6c3f93-9319-487a-b288-3c5dfcb466b0.name: The Team Builder: Sustainability

alignments.name: Designed by Exos Experts
alignments.description: The one-day immersive experience was created by Exos’s leading experts in the fields of psychology, neuroscience, and movement.

alignments.name: Delivered by Exos Mindset Coaches
alignments.description: Exos mindset coaches join organizational teams on their turf to explore and practice groundbreaking strategies — ones that are scientifically-proven to improve how humans, teams, and workplace cultures function.

alignments.name: Data & Recommendations Provided to Team Leads
alignments.description: A week after the one-day immersive event, the team lead receives a synthesis of all qualitative and quantitative data gathered during the event (via surveys and organic discussions). This is sent with a customized recommendation on where to shift focus in order to balance employee wellbeing and business objectives.

badge_template_activities.title: All participants complete a baseline assessment prior to the experience. This kickstarts their inner awareness and enables coaches to personalize the workshop.

Participants complete a strategic mix of keynotes, practicals, breakout discussions, workshops, and recharge breaks guided by Exos coaches and related to two of the four science-backed principles of working better together: establishing psychological safety and prioritizing recovery.

Each participant creates a go-forward Gameplan that helps them apply what they experienced into their workdays and team. They also take home a printed booklet that recaps key information and strategies related to the two principles and helps them apply what they learned in the future.

224cf706-ab49-4a5b-b5a5-674173e5b9ba.description: The Team Builder is a two-day in-person workshop. Exos coaches join teams on their turf and teach them groundbreaking strategies — ones that are scientifically-proven to improve how humans, teams, and workplace cultures function. By the end of the experience, each individual is ready to work at a higher level and in a healthier way.
224cf706-ab49-4a5b-b5a5-674173e5b9ba.name: The Team Builder

alignments.name: Designed by Exos Experts
alignments.description: The two-day immersive experience was created by Exos’s leading experts in the fields of psychology, neuroscience, and movement.

alignments.name: Delivered by World-Class Coaches
alignments.description: Exos mindset coaches join organizational teams on their turf to explore and practice groundbreaking strategies — ones that are scientifically-proven to improve how humans, teams, and workplace cultures function.

alignments.description: A week after the two-day immersive event, the team lead receives a synthesis of all qualitative and quantitative data gathered during the event (via surveys and organic discussions). This is sent with a customized recommendation on where to shift focus in order to balance employee wellbeing and business objectives.

badge_template_activities.title: All participants complete a baseline assessment prior to the two-day experience. This kickstarts their inner awareness and enables coaches to personalize the workshop.

Participants complete a strategic mix of keynotes, practicals, breakout discussions, workshops, and recharge breaks guided by Exos coaches and related to the four science-backed principles of working better together: establishing psychological safety, prioritizing recovery, making room for flow, and promoting dissent.

Each participant creates a go-forward Gameplan that helps them apply what they experienced into their workdays and team. They also take home a printed booklet that recaps key information and strategies related to the four main principles and helps them apply what they learned in the future.

455ed3fa-7315-41b6-b06c-565026b89073.description: The Team Builder: Dissent is a half-day, in-person workshop that helps teams pave a path for new behaviors and boundaries necessary for courageously and respectfully driving ideas further.
455ed3fa-7315-41b6-b06c-565026b89073.name: The Team Builder: Dissent

c7857818-e192-4a9f-8d54-fbba0ef59aa1.description: The Team Builder: Flow is a half-day, in-person workshop that teaches teams how to regularly tap into flow and get the creative, problem-solving juices flowing to meet and exceed business imperatives.

f1848784-b499-48fe-b367-76020f1a3a9b.description: The Team Builder: Innovation is a one-day workplace workshop that focuses on the concepts of flow and dissent, ultimately enabling teams to solve for business imperatives with creative and courageous thinking.
